nl.inl.blacklab.index

Class DocIndexerPlainTextBasic

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.inl.blacklab.index.DocIndexer
      • nl.inl.blacklab.index.DocIndexerAbstract
        • nl.inl.blacklab.index.DocIndexerPlainTextBasic
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutoCloseable

    public class DocIndexerPlainTextBasic
extends DocIndexerAbstract
    Simple example indexer for plain text files. Reads a line, chops it into words to index and keeps track of word positions.

    • Field Summary
